ygData.subject: Re: Voli Greenwhisper
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I totally agree, and as a matter of fact they already have nerfed the Treant fists.  They have removed the healing proc completely.  This makes them a much
ygData.messageBody:
>From all that I've heard, they do not spawn Grim Oakfist any more, because
>the treant fist NEEDS to be nerfed first. And if he does spawn, the tigers
>will not. I personally totally agree with this, treant fists are not
>something we need, they would make up way too powerful and totally throw off
>game balance. Come on now, do you really need gloves that have limitless
>charges of CH? Let's plz all play fair :o)

I totally agree, and as a matter of fact they already have
nerfed the Treant fists. They have removed the healing proc
completely. This makes them a much more reasonable item. As I said,
a friend of obtained them yesterday afternoon (post-patch, of course)
and reports this. So it seems that the quest is back in place, but
Voli is in the way of Oakfist spawning. I'm now back to having to
deal with him without blowing my well-cared-for faction ratings. :)

--
Aaron Braunstein
Pacific Data Management, Inc.

<aaron_braunstein@...>
